entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing late this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
